ProductInfo.Features:
1TB HDD Delivers four years of memory; Ultra hi-res  600 TVL cameras
Advanced IR filter for color enhanced imagery; 38 Black IR LEDs for 110ft automatic night vision at zero lux
65ft FT4 fire-rated cables for in-wall installation; IP65 Weather-tight outdoor use rating
Adjustable anti-vandal mount for ease of installation; Add up to 8 cameras for large property monitoring
Monitor remotely with internet connection; Customizable viewing options
ProductInfo.Name: SVAT PRO 8CH H.264 1 TB Smart Security DVR with 8 Ultra Hi-res Outdoor Surveillance Cameras and Smart Phone Compatibility (11111)
